Articles.Content:
While I was browsing the forums, I saw this as an advertisement. I checked it out and it looks good. It's also in alpha and I think it has a great concept. Go to the website Here and tell me what you think!

Edited August 27, 2013 by [ Jeremy ]
See's "Build your own rovers!" *IMMIDIATELLY CLICKS AT DOWNLOAD BUTTON

"Windows only"

...

...

...

I really need to order 7 from Amazon... Even the internet is telling me to!

This looks like a great game, I'll be sure to check it out once I do get W7.
The servers are having issues at the moment. It' on version 0.4.1x after all!

Wait a second.

A KSP/Minecraft/Starmade style game where you build hovering shooting rovers?

AND IT'S FREE!?

SHUT UP AND TAKE MY DOWNLOAD
Downloaded and ready to play tomorrow. Thanks.

Same.

Say, if you add me on Steam (shhhilent1) we could play for the first time together!

(after the tutorial of course)

I'll see what I can do when I get home.

I really want to try this.

*keyboard smashes.

When you've downloaded the game, feel free to share your rovers here also! Here's a speedster that I built last night.

I recommend that you take screenies of your creations because as of yet, saving is not yet implemented!

Hahaha, I'm playing it right now, download and install was very quick but I just keep deleting cubes accidentally instead of placing them...

I wish you could get damaged by crashing

that way I'd make a kamikaze hovering rover

EDIT: This is my current car

It looks pretty well armored (that's the intention) but it is actually as weak as the others

the wheels are a problem also, it is pretty tipsy, slippery and cruising over a small hill makes my APC want to climb it all

Edited August 28, 2013 by cesarcurado
Looks awesome! I have to try this!

Initally it was a fun game. Then after an hour of playing the level 50 guys showed up and it's impossible to get credits ._.

My airships always roll over too. Idk why.

Eh I'l coem back to it in a year. Maybe it will be better then.

Edited August 29, 2013 by The Destroyer

Initally it was a fun game. Then after an hour of playing the level 50 guys showed up and it's impossible to get credits ._.

My airships always roll over too. Idk why.

Eh I'l coem back to it in a year. Maybe it will be better then.

True, gotta hate these guys who makes plastic boxes on wheels and spam turrets...

I figured it out!

If your robot rating is under 3.00 you go to noob server. If its over, you go to the other server.

THERE IS 2 SEVERS!
I play this. My robot is less a robot, more an overweight car.
Oh look, another game that favors the P2Wers ad high end systems. *Sarcastically* yay.
I tried it out. It's a fun little game, though the steering is horrid.

Oh look, another game that favors the P2Wers ad high end systems. *Sarcastically* yay.

It's definitley not Pay to win, and high end systems? 0_o

Although they did just add GC 1 day ago...
Neat, gotta clear my partition tonight now...
Stupid windows only.

Stupid windows only.

It is pretty much in ALPHA so Windows is the first thnig to go to. Maybe later it will come to mac or whatever. Like KSP at one time didn't have Mac support

It's definitley not Pay to win, and high end systems? 0_o Although they did just add GC 1 day ago...
Actually, my system will NOT exit slide-show mode (>1 FPS) on the FASTEST setting. for those confused:
Javascript is disabled. View full album
An alpha in P2W? How does that work? Greedy game creators think the game is so good they can do anything?

An alpha in P2W? How does that work? Greedy game creators think the game is so good they can do anything?

It's not exactly Pay to win guys. All it is, (because they need funding for the game) is with real money you can buy the blocks. But no premium content and It's easy enough to get the parts yourselves. You still have to earn levels and tech.

I "played" the game. Personally, they should put more emphasis on "ALPHA" The game lags so bad on the fastest settings, and I know it's not my computer because other people have had problems. And I can't even play. The screen just turns white and freezes. And the forums are awful, the people there aren't helpful at all. It might be a better game if I could play it.
